timeline.bodyText: This will not compile, please change method to class
timeline.author: strkkk

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/MultipleVariableDeclarationsCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/MultipleVariableDeclarationsCheck.java index c37ff1b82..ed5dfd171 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/MultipleVariableDeclarationsCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/MultipleVariableDeclarationsCheck.java @@ -47,19 +47,21 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.TokenUtil; * Example: *

* 
- * public void myTest() {
- *   int mid;
- *   int high;
- *   // ...
+ * public class Test {
+ *   public void myTest() {
+ *     int mid;
+ *     int high;
+ *     // ...
  *
- *   int lower, higher; // violation
- *   // ...
+ *     int lower, higher; // violation
+ *     // ...
  *
- *   int value,
- *       index;  // violation
- *   // ...
+ *     int value,
+ *         index;  // violation
+ *     // ...
  *
- *   int place = mid, number = high; // violation
+ *     int place = mid, number = high; // violation
+ *   }
  * }
  *
*
